# Building Management at Your Fingertips
[Request a Demo](http://www.buildscience.com/<#demo>)
We interface with a building’s existing hardware to collect data in real-time and present it on a mobile-friendly dashboard. By connecting these systems together, we make any commercial building smarter using little or no added hardware.
![](http://www.buildscience.com/static/img/system_banner.png)
### build.Distinction
World-class buildings deserve straight-forward building management systems. We built Strata with usability and simplicity in mind for a truly effective solution.
### build.Insight
Access the data you need effortlessly. Strata seamlessly integrates data from any number of sources to help you understand your infrastructure’s mechanics.
### build.Further
New challenges require a fresh solution. We designed Strata to be an extendable platform from the ground up. This ensures a future-proof solution as your needs evolve.
## Features
![Strata](http://www.buildscience.com/static/img/logo_black.png) |  Other Vendors   
---|---  
Single System Monitoring (HVAC, Lighting, Security, etc.)   
Fully-Integrated Monitoring   
Instant Data Access   
Customized Trending & Reporting   
Custom Software Development   
Simple, easy-to-use Interface   
Mobile-friendly   
![Strata Dashboard](http://www.buildscience.com/static/img/dashboard.png)
## Case Study: 1M sq.ft. of Class A office space.
![Strata](http://www.buildscience.com/static/img/logo.png)
### Fortune 500 Bank in Toronto, Canada
  * Currently running Strata operating system
  * 40%+ gain in workforce productivity
  * LEED Core and Shell Platinum Tower (Toronto's first)
  * Bespoke monitoring & data solution for BAS, lighting & security
  * Insights into intelligent spaces and integrated infrastructure


## Tenant Value
  * Improve Occupant Satisfaction
  * Develop Custom Applications
  * Gain Visibility of Expenditures
  * Unlock Full Building Potential
  * Manage Data Analytics & Reporting


## Operator Value
  * Reduce Operational Expenses
  * Streamline Workflow Management
  * Improved Sustainability Accountability
  * Support LEED Certification & Title 24
  * Generate Data Analytics & Reporting


## The Future of Building Management is Simplicity
Monitoring and controlling commercial buildings have traditionally been complex and cumbersome. We believe that the future of building management should be beautifully simple. It’s about empowering tenants and building operators with the right information and the right tools for effective building control. We designed Strata with a primary focus on end-users.
![](http://www.buildscience.com/static/img/skyline_sub.png)
## Our Team
BuildScience is a team of University of Waterloo Engineering alumni with a passion for cutting-edge technology. Having worked at Fortune 500 companies, startups and institutions, we understand that tackling the challenges faced by today's buildings requires a diverse team. Over the years we've gained extensive experience working with hardware, software and power systems. We’ve built data-driven analytics that shaped display technology, designed a meteorological station that landed on Mars, and improved electricity system reliability. We are inspired by challenge.
Feel free to email us with any feedback or just to say hi at, hello@buildscience.com. You can also give us a call at, [(650) 557-6271](http://www.buildscience.com/<tel:\(650\) 557-6271>). BuildScience is based in Mountain View, California.

### BuildScience: Revolutionizing Building Management

**Overview**
Founded in 2015 and a proud participant in Y Combinator’s Winter 2015 batch, BuildScience is on a mission to become the go-to operating system for commercial buildings. Nestled in Niagara Falls, NY, the company has a small but ambitious team, eager to tackle the complexities of building management through technology.

**What They Do**
BuildScience has taken a fresh approach to building management by developing a platform that enables building owners to enhance customer service with tailored software solutions. Their flagship product, the Strata operating system, makes buildings smarter by seamlessly interfacing with existing hardware to collect real-time data, presenting it in a user-friendly dashboard. 

For instance, at a 1 million square foot Class A office building, they successfully lowered operational expenses while boosting tenant satisfaction—quite an accomplishment in the field.  

**Key Features of Strata**
- **Single System Monitoring**: Control HVAC, lighting, and security from one platform.
- **Easy Data Access**: Get insights without the hassle—data is integrated from a myriad of sources.
- **Streamlined Management**: Simplified reporting and analytics help both tenants and operators manage resources effectively.
- **Custom Development**: Create bespoke applications that meet specific needs.

**Case Study Highlight**
One notable implementation of their system was with a Fortune 500 bank in Toronto. Not only did they achieve over a 40% increase in workforce productivity, but they also supported the building's LEED Platinum certification with a tailored monitoring solution for its intelligent spaces.

**Core Values**
BuildScience focuses heavily on sustainability and energy efficiency, reflecting their commitment to building environments where occupants feel comfortable and productive. By improving operational transparency and accountability, they create systems that not only support building needs but also contribute to broader environmental goals.

**The BuildScience Team**
The company boasts a diverse group of engineering alumni from the University of Waterloo, bringing together experiences from Fortune 500 companies and startups alike. Their confidence stems from hands-on expertise in hardware, software, and power systems—tools they use to tackle real-world building challenges.

**Getting In Touch**
If you’re interested in harnessing the power of smarter building management, you can request a demo or contact them directly through their website at [BuildScience.com](http://www.buildscience.com/). They’re ready to showcase how their innovative solutions can transform your building into a model of efficiency and tenant satisfaction.

In a nutshell, BuildScience is setting out to simplify the complexities of commercial building management, proving that modern challenges require modern solutions. As we look to the future, their emphasis on straightforward, effective technology could very well represent the next wave in proptech evolution.
